replies.body:
Sorry guys. Been so busy this week I haven't had time to even think of the next part, much less write it down. 

I'll try to have something ready next week, till then.
Do you ever consider posting to a bigger audience, or in another format? Like adding pictures, visuals etc. in front of a lot of people instead of just the sales page.

> [{quoted}](name=Shawnster2002,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=GPm5usR7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-23T02:14:29.502+0000)
>
> Do you ever consider posting to a bigger audience, or in another format? Like adding pictures, visuals etc. in front of a lot of people instead of just the sales page.

The Sales page is actually viewed by quite a few people. Not only that, it is posted regularly, and comments are generally pretty boring. Lightdragoon's stories spice it up.
The only one I'd be interested in would be Quinn, but I already got that through hextech.
{{champion:268}} THE GLORY OF THE SANDS SHALL BE SULLIED BY THE MANY NOOBS WHO WILL BUY ME ON SALE
WHERE THE HELL IS LEBLANC CHROMAS
Will {{champion:67}} be on sale next week?
